original: sa yadvyapāsya kriyate tadvidho yo 'ṇurucyate // MrgT_1,5.10 //

original: yo yajjānāti kurute sa tadeveti susthitam // MrgT_1,5.13 //

analyzed: tat na sāṃśayikam tasmāt viparītam na jātucit

original: te mocayanti bhavino bhavapaṅkamagnān no vistareṇa puruṣāḥ paśupāśarūpam // MrgT_1,5.18 //

original: yasminsati ca sattvādvā na satyapi śave citiḥ // MrgT_1,6.5 //

original: nāvyāpako na kṣaṇiko naiko nāpi jaḍātmakaḥ /

original: etāvatī te baddhatva- muktatve baddhamuktayoḥ // MrgT_1,7.3 //

original: pāśavaṃ śāmbhavaṃ vāpi nānviṣyatyanyathā balam // MrgT_1,7.5 //
